mapper.select: SELECT TABLE_NAME tn, TABLE_COMMENT tc from information_schema.`TABLES` WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'shop'
select * from issue where issue_description like '%${issueDescription}%' and issue_status = '0'

select issue_id, issue_create_time, issue_description, (select pubcode_name from pubcode where pubcode_id = a.issue_type) issue_type, (select pubcode_name from pubcode where pubcode_id = a.issue_module) issue_module, issue_status, issue_solve_time, issue_close_time, issue_create_by, issue_deleted from issue a where issue_status = '0' and issue_deleted = '0'
